tooltips.manageArticles: Manage and list all your KB articles

delete.title: Delete category
delete.description: You are permanently deleting the {{title}} category. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to continue?
delete.alert: Category {{title}} has {{count}} articles. Before this category can be deleted, these articles needs to be moved to another category.
delete.newCategoryAlert: Category {{title}} has {{count}} articles. These articles will be moved to a 'General' category
delete.selectLabel: Select a category to move these articles into

validations.invalidPassword: Include at least {{letterCount}} letter and {{digitCount}} number

settingsDescription.general: Configure general settings of your EUI.

manageCategories.title: Manage categories
manageCategories.description: Create and configure the categories inside your scribble.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Configure general attributes of knowledge base
generalSettings.inputDescription: Customize the site name which is used to show the site name in  Open Graph Tags.

redirections.title: Redirections
redirections.description: Create and configure redirection rules to send users from old links to new links. All redirections are performed with 301 status codes to be SEO friendly

delete.title: Delete redirection
delete.message: You are permanently deleting redirection from {{from}} to {{to}}. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to continue?

security.description: Configure security related settings for your site.

delete.title: Delete article
delete.message: You are permanently deleting {{title}}. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to continue?

noArticle.title: There are no articles.
noArticle.description: You have not yet created an article. Create an article using the CTA given below.
noArticle.label: Add article

search.title: No results for '{{search}}'
search.description: We could not find any articles based on your search term. Try a different keyword or add a new article.
search.label: Clear search

selectedCategories.title: No results for the selected category filters
selectedCategories.description: We could not find any articles based on selected category filters. Try a different filter or add a new article.
selectedCategories.label: Clear category filters

status.title: No results for the selected article status
status.description: We could not find any articles based on selected article status. Try a different filter or add a new article.
status.label: Show all articles

login.title: {{title}} is password protected!
login.description: Enter the password to gain access to {{title}}.
